## Endpoint.detachFrom() method

Removes all connections from this endpoint to the given other endpoint.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
detachFrom(otherEndpoint: Endpoint): Endpoint;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  otherEndpoint | [Endpoint](./core.endpoint.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Endpoint](./core.endpoint.md)
